Paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cittasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissati kāyasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhittha.
ya6.2.2:170.1: » Yassa yattha vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhittha tassa tattha cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti?
ya6.2.2:171.1: Savitakkasavicārabhūmiyaṃ pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ savitakkasavicārabhūmiyaṃ tesaṃ tattha vacīsaṅkhāro ca nirujjhittha cittasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissati.
